013package org.apache.juneau.common.utils;
014
015import static java.util.Optional.*;
016
017import java.io.*;
018import java.nio.charset.*;
019import java.nio.file.*;
020
021/**
022 * Utility class for creating {@link Path}-based {@link Reader} objects.
023 *
024 * @since 9.1.0
025 */
026public class PathReaderBuilder {
027
028   /**
029    * Creates a new builder.
030    *
031    * @return A new builder.
032    */
033   public static PathReaderBuilder create() {
034      return new PathReaderBuilder();
035   }
036
037   /**
038    * Creates a new builder initialized with the specified path.
039    *
040    * @param path The path being written to.
041    * @return A new builder.
042    */
043   public static PathReaderBuilder create(final Path path) {
044      return new PathReaderBuilder().path(path);
045   }
046
047   private Path path;
048
049   private Charset charset = Charset.defaultCharset();
050
051   private boolean allowNoFile;
052
053   /**
054    * If called and the path is <jk>null</jk> or non-existent, then the {@link #build()} command will return an empty reader instead of a {@link IOException}.
055    *
056    * @return This object.
057    */
058   public PathReaderBuilder allowNoFile() {
059      this.allowNoFile = true;
060      return this;
061   }
062
063   /**
064    * Creates a new File reader.
065    *
066    * @return A new File reader.
067    * @throws IOException if an I/O error occurs opening the path
068    */
069   public Reader build() throws IOException {
070      if (!allowNoFile && path == null) {
071         throw new IllegalStateException("No path");
072      }
073      if (!allowNoFile && !Files.exists(path)) {
074         throw new NoSuchFileException(path.toString());
075      }
076      return allowNoFile ? new StringReader("") : Files.newBufferedReader(path, ofNullable(charset).orElse(Charset.defaultCharset()));
077   }
078
079   /**
080    * Sets the character encoding of the path.
081    *
082    * @param charset The character encoding. The default is {@link Charset#defaultCharset()}. Null resets to the default.
083    * @return This object.
084    */
085   public PathReaderBuilder charset(final Charset charset) {
086      this.charset = charset;
087      return this;
088   }
089
090   /**
091    * Sets the character encoding of the path.
092    *
093    * @param charset The character encoding. The default is {@link Charset#defaultCharset()}. Null resets to the default.
094    * @return This object.
095    */
096   public PathReaderBuilder charset(final String charset) {
097      this.charset = charset != null ? Charset.forName(charset) : null;
098      return this;
099   }
100
101   /**
102    * Sets the path being written from.
103    *
104    * @param path The path being written from.
105    * @return This object.
106    */
107   public PathReaderBuilder path(final Path path) {
108      this.path = path;
109      return this;
110   }
111
112   /**
113    * Sets the path of the path being written from.
114    *
115    * @param path The path of the path being written from.
116    * @return This object.
117    */
118   public PathReaderBuilder path(final String path) {
119      this.path = Paths.get(path);
120      return this;
121   }
122}
